room_title: Escape room "The Post Office" by Old Town Escape in Mankato
review: Four of us just completed The Post Office escape room. The clue construction and puzzle logic was brilliant - with cool surprises and a variety of challenge difficulties mixed in. The room, props and setting were amazing and detailed.  The host was enthusiastic and fully engaged in creating the experience.  A high quality experience from start to finish.

room_title: Escape room "The Post Office" by Old Town Escape in Mankato
review: We just celebrated our daughter's birthday at Old Town Escape in the Post Office Room. Our group of 4 teens and 2 adults thoroughly enjoyed putting to use our different skill sets! Conversation with staff was helpful and friendly. Looking forward to a future experience! Whether your group is young or old, big or small, Old Town Escape will entertain you all!

room_title: Escape room "The Post Office" by Old Town Escape in Mankato
review: Brainy fun for a group of 4-8. You will be challenged to get out of the Post Office in less than an hour. Lots of nice touches, which I can't reveal, and lots of local flavor. A nice way to spend an afternoon or evening in Mankato.

room_title: Escape room "The Post Office" by Old Town Escape in Mankato
review: This was the most fun ever! I loved the Post Office room and I wish I had a time machine so could experience it for the first time all over again. I can't wait to play the Witch's Kitchen the next time I'm in Mankato! Seriously, if you haven't been to Old Town Escape yet, cancel today's plans and go!

room_title: Escape room "The Post Office" by Old Town Escape in Mankato
review: We would HIGHLY recommend this experience to others! This was our family's first ever escape room. We did the Post Office room with kids - 11 and 13 years old and loved it. The host was very friendly and did an excellent job and dropping clues along the way. We would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a fun night out.
